AI Description: Boost.Python is a library used for interfacing Python and C++. It enables seamless integration of C++ code with Python and provides tools to expose C++ classes, functions, and objects to Python scripts, and vice versa.
Core Features: Bi-Directional Communication Between C++ & Python, Automatic Mapping Of Basic C++ Types To Python, Support For Exposing C++ Classes, Functions, & Modules To Python, Ability To Call Python Code From C++ & Vice Versa, Extensive Documentation & Community Support
